property.caption: Auto Contrast
property.description: If set, adjusts text color based on background color for filled variant

property.caption: Color
property.description: Key of theme.colors or any valid CSS color

property.caption: Disabled
property.description: Sets disabled attribute, applies disabled styles

property.caption: Full Width
property.description: If set, the button takes 100% width of its parent container

property.caption: Justify
property.description: Sets justify-content of inner element, can be used to change distribution of sections and label

property.caption: Left Section
property.description: Content displayed on the left side of the button label

property.caption: Loader Props
property.description: Props added to the Loader component (only visible when loading prop is set)

property.caption: Loading
property.description: If set, the Loader component is displayed over the button

property.caption: Radius
property.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius

property.caption: Right Section
property.description: Content displayed on the right side of the button label

property.caption: Size
property.description: Controls button height, font-size and horizontal padding
